I was thinking along the lines of Stack Exchange but not exactly. More along the lines of a badge for so many stars, msgs posted, etc..

why? I can see the value of knowing the credibility of a given user, but the <1% of users who are deceptive can easily forge identities and references to subvert the system. Badges don't mean a lot to me if I can't rely on them when it counts...
There would need to be way to prevent that.
Good point, and very true. Convore user badges would be much easier to forge, whereas Stack Exchange's fundamental design is not conducive to such.
